RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since January 10 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Wh ere Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WIZKY'S ON THE BAY was rated along early, advanced two wide and split rivals by the quarter pole, made a two wide bid leaving the turn and gained a short advantage then drew clear and remained clear to the wire to prove best, driving. TURNPIKE BOB pressed the early pace from the inside, fell back on the turn and then finished willingly late to be second best. LILTONYTWOPHONES set a pressured pace early while off the inside, then shook clear on the turn three wide, then was headed off the turn and drifted through the lane and faded. EGOT A POKER FACE chased the pace and was four to five wide on the turn, then shifted in leaving the turn and had no kick. ORASHI was allowed to settle early, four wide by the quarter pole, came six wide into the lane and had a belated rally. AMIGOS GUITAR stalked the pace four wide and weakened. SIR REX was off slowly, then started to advance leaving the half mile marker and went bad at the seven sixteenths and fell, vanned off. STEWARDS INQUIRY concerning the run entering the turn, after reviewing the replays the race was left as is.

ENTRY.NAME: Wizky's On the Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early, split rivals 1/4, bid 2 wide, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Sir Rex
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, advanced 1/2, broke down 7/16, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Turnpike Bob
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, fell back turn, finished willingly inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Orashi
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide 1/4 pole, came 6 wide, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Liltonytwophones
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, 2-3 wide turn, drifted lane, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Amigos Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Egot a Poker Face
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, 4-5 wide turn, needed stretch bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Claiming Purse 18100. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000, if for $14,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORGANS COVE was rated along three wide early, made a four wide bid on the turn and hit the front nearing the furlong marker, then drew out in the final furlong under a mild drive. DISCREETLIN JONES dueled for the early lead and made a two wide bid on the turn to draw clear, then was headed by the furlong marker and proved to be no match for that rival while saving the place. MAKE A SPLASH chased the pace on the inside and then was two wide by the quarter pole and just missed the place award on the inside. FINISHING TOUCH was settled early, four wide by the quarter pole and had no rally. FAIRVIEW dueled for the lead on the inside and weakened. OUTSPEND was through early. KIRRABON bumped at the start and failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Fairview
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Make a Splash
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, 2 wide 1/4 pole, missed 2nd inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Discreetlin Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, bid 2 wide turn, clear 1/4 pole, no match,held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Outspend
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Kirrabon
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Morgans Cove
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 3 wide, bid 4 wide, drew clear 1/16, mild drive

ENTRY.NAME: Finishing Touch
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 4 wide 1/4 pole, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since January 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PICTOR set the early pace two wide, drew out on the turn and was well clear by the furlong marker, then got tired late and lasted to prove best, driving. MEET ME AT MUNDIS was allowed to settle early, eased out and advanced on the turn, came five wide into the lane and closed fast late to just miss. TRENDING UP was reserved early, advanced three wide on the turn, angled out in the lane and had a late rally. JUMPMASTER was reserved early, came six wide into the lane and had a mild late rally. ECLIPTICALS ELLIOT stalked the early pace three wide, fell back on the turn and then was empty. TRADERS LUCK tracked the pace on the inside and weakened. COPPERHEAD CREEK failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Jumpmaster
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, came 6 wide upper stretch, mild rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Meet Me At Mundis
ENTRY.OWNER: Siedler Craig and Simoff Andrew L
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, came 5 wide, closed gap, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Trending Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserve3d, 3 wide 1/4 pole, angled out, late rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Pictor
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 2 wide, drew out turn, lasted late,driving

ENTRY.NAME: Traders Luck
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, saved ground turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Copperhead Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Eclipticals Elliot
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, fell back turn, empty,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 50. Claiming Purse 14400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHARP CATCH set the pace on the inside while clear, then was headed by the quarter pole, turned back that bid and shook clear by the furlong marker and edged away to prove best, driivng. ONE LAST FLING tracked the early pace from between rivals, then made a three wide bid on the turn to go on even terms for command by the quarter pole, but hung in the lane, second best. LET'SGOSHAGDANCIN tracked the early pace on the inside, fell back on the turn, then finished willingly late but needed more. BUSTIN WIDE OPEN was reserved early, angled in by the furlong marker and had a belated rally for the minor rewards. IOANNA chased the pace four wide, then was three wide on the turn and weakened. SAMETIMENEXTYEAR lacked a solid rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Let'sgoshagdancin
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, fell back turn, finished willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Sharp Catch
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, headed 1/4 pole, turned back bid, clear, driving

ENTRY.NAME: One Last Fling
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, hung

ENTRY.NAME: Ioanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, 3 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Bustin Wide Open
ENTRY.OWNER: Valente Roddy J Bilinski Darlene and Alfred Richard
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, angled in 1/8, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Sametimenextyear
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, lacked rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 14400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIZ THE BEST was reserved early, started to unwind leaving the five sixteenths, angled out six wide leaving the turn, then closed fast to get up late and edged away to prove best, driving. SWEET MESA tracked the early pace and made a three wide bid on the turn to draw clear leaving the quarter pole, then remained clear by the furlong marker, then was caught late. ELEGANT TASTE tracked the early pace on the inside, then eased out leaving the quarter pole and came three wide into the lane, then finished well. LOIS'S CAUSE was rated early and made a mild bid four wide on the turn but finished evenly late. INSPECTOR RELOAD was reserved early, three wide on the turn and came five wide into the lane and had a belated rally. AUTOMATED TELLER dueled for the lead three wide, two wide on the turn and weakened. SHELLEY'S SONG dueled for the early lead on the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Miz the Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, angled out 6 wide, closed fast, clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Inspector Reload
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 3 wide turn, came 5 wide, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Elegant Taste
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, eased out 1/4, came 3 wide, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Lois's Cause
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early, bid 4 wide 1/4, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Shelley's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Mesa
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, drew clear, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Automated Teller
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3 wide, bid 2 wide, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Claiming Purse 18100. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000, if for $22,500, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEWSDLEY set the pace while clear and getting over to the inside, then dug in gamely in the stretch and held sway late to prove best, driving. OUT OF AMMO chased the early pace and made a four wide bid on the turn and came five wide into the lane, then was slowly gaining late but could not get to the winner. I'M HEADING EAST tracked the pace two wide, came three wide into the lane and had no kick, needed more. UPTOWN SERAPHINA was allowed to settle early, made a inside move on the turn but was even late. BACK TO D' FUTURE broke in and was off slowly at the start, saved ground far back, advanced on the turn and angled out in the lane and had a belated rally. HOT FUDGE WARRIOR chased the pace in between rivals and weakened. COULD BE A COUGAR chased the pace five wide and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Back to D' Future
ENTRY.OWNER: Uptowncharlybrown Stud LLC and Mihalic Jody
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, off slowly, saved ground, angled out, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Heading East
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 2 wide, came 3 wide, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Fudge Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace between horses, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Out of Ammo
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, bid 4 wide, came 5 wide, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown Seraphina
ENTRY.OWNER: Strunk John L Strunk Theresa A Baxter Ted R and Baxter Susan G
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside move turn, even late

ENTRY.NAME: Could Be a Cougar
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 5 wide, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Newsdley
ENTRY.COMMENT: set unchallenged pace inside, dug in stretch, held sway, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 71. Allowance Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since February 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since January 10 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CUENCA stalked the early pace four wide, made a three wide move on the turn when ready to draw clear by the quarter pole, then widened the margin off the turn and then remained well clear to prove much the best, mild urging. DANCE A LITTLE JIG was void of early speed, came wide into the lane and rallied well to be clearly second best. GINGERS WISH was rated along the inside, swung out four wide leaving the turn and lacked the needed winning bid, bested rest. SPECTACULLARI was reserved early, advanced five wide by the quarter pole but flattened out. THEGODDESSOFSNAKES pressed the pace three wide and then dropped back on the turn, weakened. COSMOLOGICAL vied for the early lead on the inside, drew clear on the backstretch, then was headed by the winner on the turn and gave way. SPRINKLE THIS was allowed to settle early, made a mild bid four wide on the turn but then was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Spectacullari
ENTRY.OWNER: McClay Thomas G Sweigart Dennis and Cullari Salvatore
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, advanced 5 wide 1/4 pole, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Sprinkle This
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, mild bid 4 wide turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Gingers Wish
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, swung 4 wide, needed bid, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Dance a Little Jig
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, came wide upper stretch, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Cosmological
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, drew clear backstretch, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Thegoddessofsnakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, dropped back turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Cuenca
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, 3 wide move, clear 1/4, drew off stretch,
